title: Badlands National Park: Schedule Of Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Schedule Of Events              Calendar       In 2016, interpretive programs will be offered from Late May - Labor Day.  2016 Badlands Astronomy Festival (July 8-10)            Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 5 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Badlands National Park NPS Centennial Hike to Cedar Butte      Time: 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: White River Visitor Center Fees: No Fee     Friday, August 12, 2016 Enjoy panoramic views from the top of Cedar Butte during this 4 hour rugged walk. View Details      Badlands National Park Centennial Wilderness Hike      Time: 8:00 AM to 1:00 PM Location: Sage Creek Wilderness area Fees: Free with paid park entrance fee     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Experience the beauty of the Badlands prairie and explore its unique geology during this 5 hour hike in the wilderness. View Details      Badlands National Park Prairie Plant Walk      Time: 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Meet at Notch Trailhead Fees: Free      Friday, August 19, 2016 Learn about prairie plants and their traditional uses. View Details      Badlands National Park NPS Centennial Founder's Day      Location: Ben Reifel Visitor Center Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Join us as we celebrate the National Park Service's 100th birthday! View Details      Badlands National Park Brulé      Time: 6:00 PM to 7:30 PM Location: Cedar Pass Amphitheater Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Centennial Concert Series:  Native American music group Brulé.
